item.title: Accessing Azure Blob Storage with Service Principal from Business Central AL
item.description: Azure Blob Storage from AL After long time I needed to solve some AL problem for my colleagues and I was not able to find the solution on internet and even from other MVPs. Today I had some time to dig into the problem and I have solved it. I want to share the solution with you. But first, we need some introduction into the problem. It is common to use Azure Blob Storage to store data and work with them from Dynamics 365 Business Central.
